shortdesc.draft-comment: how do I talk about standalone mode? as a single process? as a single what?

conbody.p: execution modestandalone and cluster modescluster modedescriptionstandalone modedescriptionThe can run standalone mode or cluster mode. In standalone mode, the runs as a standalone product.more in this sentence above. The runs in standalone mode by default.
In cluster mode, the runs as an application within Spark, allowing it to process large volumes of data from a Kafka CDH cluster.

Spark is an open source cluster-computing application that is installed as part of the Kafka CDH. Within Spark, the spawns a worker for each partition in the Kafka cluster. So each partition has a worker to process data.

p.note: If you add a partition to the topic being read by the , restart the pipeline to enable the to generate a new worker to read from the new partition.
